summary: Rayne joins a resistence group to fight against the Nazis during world war two.
cast: Natassia Malthe|Brendan Fletcher|Michael Paré|Willam Belli|Annett Culp|Clint Howard|Steffen Mennekes|Arved Birnbaum|Safiya Kaygin|Nik Goldman|Vili Matula|Boris Bakal|Davorka Tovilo|Dora Lipovcan|Katarina Brozincevic|Luka Peros|Goran Manic|Boris Balta|Dino More|Frank Raffel|Marco Dovsek|Branka Prislic|Slavika Kosca-Vrlazi|Petar Bencic|Sven Jakir|Dusan Bucan|Damir Poljicak|Mark Boldin|Miran Kurspahic|Slaven Spanovic|Michael Reed|Hrvoje Dokoza|Karlo Pervan|Dalibor Brkic|Natalie Burn|Robert Hessland|Fabrice Colson|Adolf Hitler|Vjekoslav Katusin
title: BloodRayne: El tercer Reich
